channel.title: buses on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in buses on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: Buses
item.description: From October 2008 The Bus 1 I stand in the bus The crowd sways behind me My dupatta catches the flow But oh! Now the flow chokes me.

item.title: City Streets
item.description: From October 2007 Vehicle fumes bathe me as I walk the city streets. The roars of blue and white paid concentration cells, and lorries carrying rough blocks of granite vibrate my stomach.
